1. Before you judge me make sure that you’re perfect.. ??
2. It’s better to live alone. There is no friendship with a fool.
3. Style is a way to say who u are without speaking.
4. Always remember you are unique, just like everyone else. !!
5. People say I have a dirty mind, But I’m say its just creative! !!
6. Some people R just so FAKE that if u look properly at the back of their neck, you’ll find a tag saying “MADE IN CHINA”
7. When someone says: u are UGLY TELL them oh sorry I was trying to look like you!!
8. A bad attitude is like a flat tire. If u don’t change it, you’ll never go anywhere.
9. I don’t have an attitude!! I have a personality U can’t handle!!!
10. I’m single as my love story is being written by god and he is busy is making it best.
11. Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new. !!
12. If you obey all the rules, you’ll miss all the fun.!!!
13. I’m not changed it’s just I grew up and u should try too.
14. My personality is who I am and my attitude depends on who you are!
15. I never insult people I only tell them what they R.
16. Everything that kills me makes me feel alive.!!
17. If u think I am BAD than you’re wrong, I’m the worst.
18. I enjoy when people show Attitude to me coz it shows that they need an Attitude to impress me!
19. I don’t have a bad handwriting, I have my own FONT. !!
20. Please don’t get confused between my personality and my attitude.
21. My attitude based on how u treat me.
22. I May Be Wrong…. But I Doubt It.
23. I Am Not A Nerd, I M Just Smarter Than You.
24. Everything That Kills Me Makes Me Feel Alive.
25. I’M Sorry My Fault. I Forgot You’Re An Idiot.
26. Don’T Take My Kindness As A Sign Of Weakness.
27. The Only Disability In Life Is A Bad Attitude.
28. Sometimes You Have To Know When To Stop Hoping.
29. My Level Of Maturity Is Depends On Who I’M With.
30. Do You Want To Judge Me? Please Take A Look At You.
31. I’M A Nobody, Nobody Is Perfect, Therefore I’M Perfect.
32. Attitude Is Like Underwear- Don’T Show It Just Wore It.
33. I Hate The Moment When Suddenly My Anger Turns Into Tears.
34. Attitude Is Like A Price Tag, It Shows How Valuable You Are.
35. Age Has Been The Perfect Fire Extinguisher For Flaming Youth.
36. People Say I Have A Dirty Mind, But I’M Say Its Just Creative!
37. Friends Make The Bad Times Good… And The Good Times Unforgettable.
38. Kiss Me, And You May See Stars, Love Me And I Will Give Them To You.
39. Find Out What You Like Doing Best And Get Someone To Pay You For Doing It.
40. My Parents Should Be Proud Of Me Because I’M Addicted To Facebook Not To Drugs!
41. I Am Not A Spider Man Nor A Superman, However I Am Superhero For My Girl Friend !
42. I Am Not Made Or Unmade By The Things Which Happen To Me But My Reaction To Them.
43. Your Attitude Belongs To You And It’S Your Choice If You Want To Have A Good One.
44. Girls Express Their Feelings Via Tears. Boys Express Their Feelings Via Beers.
45. Don’T Judge My Past, Look At My Present, I Am Sure My Future Is Really Rocking.
46. Your Attitude Belongs To You And It’S Your Choice If You Want To Have A Good One.
47. I Forgive But Never Forgot.
48. Waiting For Wi-Fi Network.
49. Nobody Move. I Just Lost My Mind.
50. I Am Hot Dude With A Cool Attitude.
